page.title: 07Kenn-Local History or Legend
page.content: You can ask virtually any resident of {Kenn}about{"Kenn Pier"}and how it got it's name and they almost certainly will say "It got it's name from when the{Banana Boats}came in." That story is not to be believed it is only a villiage tale, the{Banana Boats}never came up the river because the water wasn't deep enough.{Kenn Pier}got it's name because like{Wigan Pier}it's a very small bridge. Another local story is the hangings at the{Drum & Monkey {Inn.}Some men got drunk and set fire to some hay. For this they were hanged and their families were deported to Australlia. A more recent super-natural tale is of a young girl,on her way back from shopping who just disappeared without trace.
